tool_description: this is instagram user api to get json data about  user by username
title: IDD

api_list.name: username
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idd.p.rapidapi.com/{username}/?__a=1"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idd.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
